org.sangraama.assets

Class DummyPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sangraama.assets.AbsPlayer
      • org.sangraama.assets.DummyPlayer

  • public class DummyPlayer
extends AbsPlayer
    ************************************************************************** Player class have the main functionality of getting updates of the game world. It is not authenticate for responding to client events. Dummy Player does not have body and fixture.
    Version:
    : v1.2

    • Constructor Summary

        Specified by:

      • reqInterestIn

        public void reqInterestIn(float x,
                 float y)
        Description copied from class: AbsPlayer
        Request for client's Area of Interest around player. When player wants to fulfill it's Area of Interest, it will ask for the updates of that area. This method checked in following sequence, 1) check on own sub-tile 2) check whether location is inside current 3) check for the server which own that location and send connection tag
        Specified by:
        reqInterestIn in class AbsPlayer
        Parameters:
        x - x coordination of interest location
        y - y coordination of interest location
